== Main Inclusion Report for Meanwhile ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/m/meanwhile, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Optional build dependency of gaim
** Allows support for Sametime messaging, popular in corporations. Bug #58129. I have also received email and IRC requests for the same.
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=meanwhile|CVE entry]]</nowiki>, unlisted in CVE.
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=meanwhile|Secunia history]]</nowiki>, unlisted in Secunia.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** No open <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:meanwhile|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?atid=656718&group_id=110565&func=browse|upstream tracker]]</nowiki>.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
